title: EnguvadariyAnO
sahitya:
EnguvariyAnO sakhiyE en nilai kaNDirangAnO manam


anupallavi

  pongum karuNaik-kaDalAi bhuvi tanil engum nirai yadukula tilakanai ninaind-


caraNam    ninaivennum kanaka izhai tanilE kaNNan nirmala nAma nam maNigaLai iNaittE
 anavaratam mArbagham tanil pUNDu annavarukkAna Ashai koNDE manam
